attributes.action: Allow dogs (including working dogs and crossbreeds) the right to vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give dogs the right to vote in local and general elections. Place each photo of the candidates on the floor with a doggy treat and see which treat is taken, then assume that's who the dog votes for. After all, they couldn't create a more incompetent and corrupt government than we have already...
PS - minimum age for dog votes is to be one year old, dogs must be microchipped and registered with a vet.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
